item.title: Severe Thunderstorm Watch until 07:00PM from Webster County WV Emergency Services : Nixle
item.description: THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE HAS ISSUED SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 666 IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN WEST VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 31 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL WEST ...

item.title: The Camden on Gauley Water Works has issued a boil water adv
item.description: The Camden on Gauley Water Works has issued a boil water advisory for the entire system until further notice. Questions, call the Water Works. The Camden on Gauley Water Works has issued a boil water advisory for the entire system until further notice. Questions, call the Water Works.
